entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10 except minus 6 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 10 except minus 6 inland. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023
